ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule applies when someone tries to close the case with blank values of funding decision.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EDRD', ISCHANGED(Status), NOT(ISPICKVAL(EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Approved")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Denied")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Extended")), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'MOH Review'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Funding Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Funding Denied')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide the Funding Decision details before closing the case.
